name: iPad Pro
about: Astonishing performance. Incredibly advanced displays.Super fast wireless connectivity. Next-level Apple Pencil capabilities. Powerful new features in iPadOS. The ultimate iPad experience.

name: iPad Air
about: iPad Air lets you immerse yourself in whatever you are reading, watching, or creating. The 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display features advanced technologies like True Tone, P3 wide color, and an anti reflective coating.

name: iPad
about: Powerful. Easy to use. Versatile. iPad is designed for all the things you love to do. Work, play, create, learn, stay connected, and more. All at an incredible value.

name: iPad mini
about: iPad mini is meticulously designed to be absolutely beautiful. An all-new enclosure features a new, larger edge-to-edge screen, along with narrow borders and elegant rounded corners.
